ingredients: 1. 1 small-medium pumpkin/butternut squash (about 4 cups diced), peeled and diced
2. 1.5 cup brown chickpeas/bengal gram/kala chana, soaked or soaked and par boiled
5. 1 tablespoon panch phoron/Indian five spice (see below), divided
12. 2 tablespoons oil (using pure mustard oil will impart a nice flavor)
Optional: For Garnish: Fresh cilantro/coriander and pepper flakes
Optional: For Garnish: Fresh cilantro/coriander and pepper flakes
